channel.title: Pages on Solids & Materials Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Solids & Materials Lab

item.title: Research
item.description: Mathematical models #slide-window { position: relative; width: 100%; height: 350px; overflow: hidden; top: 0px; left: 0px; } #slides-list { width: 100%; height: 350px; position: absolute; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0.66s ease; -webkit-transition: all 0.66s ease; } .slide { list-style: none; position: relative; float: left; margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; height: 350px; background: #ccc; text-align: center; line-height: 100%; background-size: cover; background-position: 50% 50%; color: #fff; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); -webkit-transform-style: preserve-3d; } .

item.title: People
item.description: Ananya Renuka Balakrishna Assistant Professor of Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering (CV) Email: renukaba@usc.edu Delin Zhang Ph.D. Student Email: delinzha@usc.edu Ashwin Atul Daware Master’s Student Email: daware@usc.edu Carl Anthony Kohnke Undergraduate Student Email: ckohnke@usc.edu Benjamin Bedregal Barboza Undergraduate Student Email: bedregal@usc.edu Openings We are always looking for motivated Ph.D. students to join our group. Please visit https://ame.usc.edu/admission/ for further details on the admission process, and feel free to email me with questions at renukaba@usc.

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2021 Balakrishna, A. R., & James, R. D. (2021). A tool to predict coercivity in magnetic materials. Acta Materialia, 116697. PDF Balakrishna, A.R., & James, R. D. (2021). A solution to the permalloy problem. arXiv e-prints, arXiv-2101. PDF 2019 Balakrishna, A. R., Chiang, Y. M., & Carter, W. C. (2019). Phase-field model for diffusion-induced grain boundary migration: An application to battery electrodes. Physical Review Materials, 3(6), 065404. PDF Christensen, C. K.
